A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The move was great with good subtle things added throughout the movie. Foreshadowing was solid. Proper amount of nostalgia from the past combined with new elements.  There were a couple of things that required you to suspend your disbelief a bit\, but what movies don't. Far more went right in this movie than what went wrong. I seriously don't get the majority of these negative reviews.
